testcase.name: Rest API Testing
testcase.system-out: Given url "http://dummy.restapiexample.com/api/v1/employees" .............. passed When method Get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response.status == "success" .................................... passed * match responseType == "json" ............................................ passed * assert responseTime <= 2000 ............................................. passed * match response.status == "#string" ...................................... passed * match response.data == "#array" ......................................... passed * print response.data[0].employee_name .................................... passed * match response.data[0].employee_name contains "Tiger Nixon" ............. passed
